episodes.synopsis: Accounts from inmates, officers and the warden of a maximum-security prison shed light on the disturbing realities of living in solitary confinement.
episodes.title: Frontline: Locked Up in America: Solitary Nation

episodes.synopsis: Focusing on four housing project residents and their struggles with the law, "Frontline" examines the impact of mass incarceration in America.
episodes.title: Frontline: Locked Up in America: Prison State

video.title: Locked Up in America
video.synopsis: "Frontline" goes inside America's prison system, exploring controversies around solitary confinement and attempts to break the cycle of incarceration.
